text: numbalage pirimi daruvan ghatanaya kara dama numbalage kantavanta jivita danaya demin siti firavunge pælæntiyen numbala va mudava gat avasthave numbala kerehi vu allahge asirvadayan menehi karanu yæyi musa tama janayata pævasu avasthava sihipat karanu. tavada mevayehi numbalage sarva baladhari allahgen vu pariksanayak æta
